body_content.explanation: in a way that is of interest at the present time, or that relates to things that are happening at present:
examples: I think he was struggling to be topically relevant.
The book is so topically relevant to our daily lives.

body_content.explanation: in a way that relates to a particular subject:
examples: This archive consists of a topically organized selection of articles.
Links from topically related pages will be beneficial to your website.

body_content.explanation: used on the outside of the body:
examples: The cream is applied topically, that is, to the skin.
The drug is used topically to remove sun-damaged cells.
